languages.text: {n}Маршал резко втягивает воздух.{/n} "Исключено. Это значило бы, что кто-то, обладающий немалыми ресурсами и влиянием, знает о ее существовании. У нас нет доказательств того, что это произошло. Скорее общее положение дел в Просторе Коронус, где хозяйничают пираты и ксеносы, может привести к случайному раскрытию местоположения мира-склада".

{n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал резко втягивает воздух.{/n} "Исключено. Это значило бы, что кто-то, обладающий немалыми ресурсами и влиянием, знает о ее существовании. У нас нет доказательств того, что это произошло. Скорее общее положение дел в Просторе Коронус, где хозяйничают пираты и ксеносы, может привести к случайному раскрытию местоположения мира-склада".

We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, there is a much higher chance that the depot world is discovered by accident."

{n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, there is a much higher chance that the depot world is discovered by accident."

Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

{n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

languages.text: {n}Décontenancé, le maréchal marque un temps d'arrêt.{/n} « Impossible. Cela voudrait dire qu'un personnage influent et disposant de vastes ressources serait au courant de son existence. Or, nous n'avons aucune preuve susceptible de corroborer une telle hypothèse. À en juger par la situation actuelle dans les Étendues de Koronus, avec les hordes de pirates et de xénos qui écument la région en toute impunité, il est plus probable que le monde entrepôt ait été découvert par hasard. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

traits.locale_text: {n}Décontenancé, le maréchal marque un temps d'arrêt.{/n} « Impossible. Cela voudrait dire qu'un personnage influent et disposant de vastes ressources serait au courant de son existence. Or, nous n'avons aucune preuve susceptible de corroborer une telle hypothèse. À en juger par la situation actuelle dans les Étendues de Koronus, avec les hordes de pirates et de xénos qui écument la région en toute impunité, il est plus probable que le monde entrepôt ait été découvert par hasard. »

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal toma aire.{/n} «Imposible. Eso significaría que alguien con enormes recursos e influencia es consciente de su existencia. No tenemos ninguna prueba que apoye esta conjetura. Teniendo en cuenta el estado actual de la Extensión de Koronus, con piratas y xenos navegando con impunidad, es mucho más probable que el mundo almacén se encuentre por accidente».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal toma aire.{/n} «Imposible. Eso significaría que alguien con enormes recursos e influencia es consciente de su existencia. No tenemos ninguna prueba que apoye esta conjetura. Teniendo en cuenta el estado actual de la Extensión de Koronus, con piratas y xenos navegando con impunidad, es mucho más probable que el mundo almacén se encuentre por accidente».

languages.text: {n}元帅深深地吸了口气。{/n}“绝无可能。如果有人打算前往那颗行星，那便意味着某些拥有大量资源与庞大人脉的人知道那颗行星的存在。目前，我们并没有得到相关证据支持这个假设。考虑到科罗努斯扩区的现状，海盗和异形四处游荡，那些资源储备很可能会被无心之人意外发现。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅深深地吸了口气。{/n}“绝无可能。如果有人打算前往那颗行星，那便意味着某些拥有大量资源与庞大人脉的人知道那颗行星的存在。目前，我们并没有得到相关证据支持这个假设。考虑到科罗努斯扩区的现状，海盗和异形四处游荡，那些资源储备很可能会被无心之人意外发现。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall atmet scharf ein.{/n} "Unmöglich. Das würde bedeuten, dass jemand, der über beträchtliche Ressourcen und Einfluss verfügt, von seiner Existenz weiß. Uns liegen keinerlei Beweise für diese Annahme vor. Nachdem sich Piraten und Xenos in der Koronus-Ausdehnung immer weiter ausbreiten, ist eher davon auszugehen, dass die Lagerwelt zufällig entdeckt wurde."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall atmet scharf ein.{/n} "Unmöglich. Das würde bedeuten, dass jemand, der über beträchtliche Ressourcen und Einfluss verfügt, von seiner Existenz weiß. Uns liegen keinerlei Beweise für diese Annahme vor. Nachdem sich Piraten und Xenos in der Koronus-Ausdehnung immer weiter ausbreiten, ist eher davon auszugehen, dass die Lagerwelt zufällig entdeckt wurde."

languages.text: {n}将帥はハッと行きを飲んだ。{/n}「あり得ません。それは、膨大な資源と影響力を持つ誰かが、その存在を知っているということを意味します。私たちは、この推測を支持する証拠を持っていません。コロヌス・エクスパンスが海賊や異種族の好き放題になっている現在の状況を鑑みるに、保管惑星が偶然に発見される可能性の方がはるかに高いです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal draws a sharp breath.{/n} "Impossible. That would mean that someone commanding vast resources and influence knows of its existence. We have no evidence that could support this conjecture. Considering the current state of the Koronus Expanse, with pirates and xenos roaming where they please, it is far more likely that the storage world will be discovered by accident."

languages.text: {n}Miralay, sert bir şekilde nefes alıyor.{/n} "Mümkün değil. Zira öyleyse devasa kaynaklara ve nüfuza sahip birisi, aşarın oradaki varlığından haberdar demektir. Bu varsayımı destekleyecek kanıtımız yok. Koronus Enginliği'nin mevcut durumunu düşününce korsanlar ve zenolar, istedikleri gibi at koşturuyor. Depo dünyanın tesadüfen keşfedilmiş olması daha olası."
